content:
The special unit of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine "Kabul 9" detects and destroys Russian invaders in the Zaporozhye region.

About thisinformsMain Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

The video shows the results of successful fire damage to 2 trucks and bugs of Russian invaders, as well as the starting position of the FPV-punks of the occupiers where hostile operators were. The enemy's losses are specified.

The Kabul 9 special unit originated at the beginning of a large -scale Russian invasion. It was formed by veterans of the Ukrainian special services and the Armed Forces with the assistance and participation of the head of the GRU of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Kiril Budanova.

In addition, the special unit participated in the battle for Kiev in Gostomel and in the Brovar direction. Mortar calculations and sniper groups of the Ukrainian military intelligence unit also worked during the defense of Bakhmut.

"Now the intelligence officers continue to fight against Russian invaders in the south of Ukraine,"-added in the department.

As reported by the Armyinform, our drors“Two -flew”invaders in Kharkiv region.
title: GUR showed how special forces destroy trucks and bugi occupants
description: The Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about it. The video shows the results ...
author: Army Inform
